title: File:April 2024 Defense Cooperation Agreement bilateral coordination meeting at the U.S. Embassy in Port Moresby, Papua New Guinea (2).jpg
author: U.S. Embassy - Port Moresby, Papua New Guinea
description:
Ambassador Ann Marie Yastishock and Minister for Defence Dr. Billy Joseph convened a Defense Cooperation Agreement bilateral coordination meeting at the U.S. Embassy this week.

Conversations from this meeting will facilitate bilateral and multilateral efforts enabling the United States to be more responsive to emergency situations, including humanitarian assistance and disaster relief.

This meeting marked the next step of bilateral coordination since the agreement entered into force in August 2023.
